title: 2015 USAC Traxxas Silver Crown Series
text: The 2015 <a href="United%20States%20Auto%20Club">USAC</a> <a href="Traxxas">Traxxas</a> Silver Crown Champ Car Series season was the 44th season of the <a href="USAC%20Silver%20Crown%20Series">USAC Silver Crown Series</a>. The series began with the Hemelgarn Racing/Super Fitness Rollie Beale Classic at the <a href="Toledo%20Speedway">Toledo Speedway</a> on May 1, and ended on October 10 at <a href="Great%20New%20York%20State%20Fair">New York State Fairgrounds</a>. <a href="Kody%20Swanson">Kody Swanson</a> began the season as the defending champion and retained his title.
